prompt: Create Cisco IOS XR 7.0.1 MDT configuration for hardware inventory/state: stream inventory entities and platform slot instance state. Use gRPC no TLS. Collector 192.0.2.196 port 57500. Sample every 10 minutes.
candidate:
telemetry model-driven
 sensor-group HW-INVENTORY-STATE
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-plat-chas-invmgr-oper:inventory/entities/entity
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-plat-chas-invmgr-oper:platform/slot-instances/slot-instance
 !
 destination-group DG-GRPC
  address-family ipv4
   destination 192.0.2.196
    port 57500
    encoding self-describing-gpb
    protocol grpc no-tls
 !
 subscription SUB-HW-INVENTORY-STATE
  sensor-group-id HW-INVENTORY-STATE sample-interval 600000
  destination-group-id DG-GRPC
 !
expected:
telemetry model-driven
 sensor-group INV-OPER
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-invmgr-oper:inventory/entities/entity
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-platform-oper:platform/racks/rack/slots/slot/instances/instance/state
 !
 subscription SUB-INV
  sensor-group-id INV-OPER sample-interval 600000
  destination-group-id DG-INV
 !
 destination-group DG-INV
  address-family ipv4 192.0.2.196 port 57500
   encoding self-describing-gpb
   protocol grpc no-tls
  !
 !
!
rationale: The candidate config correctly uses the specified IP (192.0.2.196), port (57500), transport (grpc no-tls), and encoding (self-describing-gpb), fulfilling the hard requirements. The sample interval is set to 600000 ms (10 minutes), which matches the request. However, the sensor-paths differ from the expectation: the candidate uses 'Cisco-IOS-XR-plat-chas-invmgr-oper:inventory/entities/entity' and 'platform/slot-instances/slot-instance' while the expectation uses 'Cisco-IOS-XR-invmgr-oper:inventory/entities/entity' and 'Cisco-IOS-XR-platform-oper:platform/racks/rack/slots/slot/instances/instance/state'. The candidate's sensor-paths are related to hardware inventory and platform slot instance state but are not exactly the same and may represent different data models or hierarchy. The naming of sensor-group and destination-group differ but this is acceptable. Overall, the config meets the main requirements but the sensor-paths are not fully aligned with the reference, so a moderate score is given.
